reuters.title: MERIDIAN DIAGNOSTICS <KITS> GETS FDA APPROVAL
reuters.body: Meridian Diagnostics Inc said it received approval from the Food and Drug Administration to market a test to detect a disease which drains fluids from the bodies of AIDS victims. The company said the test detects Cryptosporidium SP in stool specimens. The disease can result in life threatening loss of fluids, the company added. Reuter 
